summary: Frontend testing completed for CareerQuest AI job application platform. All requested features verified working: Reports/Analytics Dashboard with 6 stat cards and charts, Applications page with clickable stat filters and Retry Failed functionality, Live Jobs page with Auto-Apply AI Agent panel and working View Original links. Navigation between all pages works correctly. Login flow with test credentials successful.
passed_tests: Login flow with test credentials (test_autoapply@example.com / testpass123)
Reports Dashboard loads with Analytics Dashboard title
Reports Dashboard shows 6 quick stats (Total Applications, Auto-Applied, Interviews, Offers, Avg ATS Score, Failed)
Reports Dashboard shows Success Rate card (13.8%)
Reports Dashboard shows This Week and Resources cards
Reports Dashboard Status tab with pie chart and progress bars
Reports Dashboard Timeline tab with Application Timeline chart
Reports Dashboard Sources tab with pie chart and bar chart
Applications page loads with My Applications title
Applications page shows 8 stat cards (Total, Ready, Applied, Pending, Interview, Rejected, Accepted, Failed)
Applications page stat cards are clickable and filter by status (URL updates)
Applications page Retry Failed button visible and functional
Applications page search and filter controls work
Applications page shows application list with View Resume, Download, View Job buttons
Live Jobs page loads with Live Job Listings title
Live Jobs page shows Auto-Apply AI Agent panel with stats
Live Jobs page shows Run Auto-Apply Now, Settings, View History buttons
Live Jobs page shows Search Jobs form with all fields
Live Jobs page shows Recommended (23) and Search Results tabs
Live Jobs page View Original links work - opens external job page in new tab
Navigation between Dashboard, Applications, Reports, Live Jobs works correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Reports Dashboard has comprehensive analytics with 6 stat cards, success rate, charts (pie, bar, area). Applications page has clickable stat cards that filter by status, Retry Failed button works. Live Jobs page has Auto-Apply AI Agent panel, View Original links open external job pages in new tabs. Profile completion is at 63% which disables Auto-Apply (requires 80%). Test user has 29 total applications, 4 applied, 22 ready_to_apply, 3 failed.

features: Clickable stat cards filter by status
